turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Wake Up / Escape from the Citadel.
turn.1: What happened in Season 3 of The Adventures of Pete & Pete?
turn.2: Despite Finn's loss of his father and limb, Finn and Jake are vindicated when the Lich is turned into a giant baby.
turn.3: Are there any other interesting aspects about this article?
turn.4: Both "Wake Up" and "Escape from the Citadel", were met with critical acclaim.
turn.5: Why were they met with critical acclaim?
turn.6: Robert Lloyd of the "Los Angeles Times" felt that the episode was exciting, whereas Oliver Sava of "The A.V. Club" applauded the episode's use of humor as a way of balancing out the heavier aspects of the plot.
turn.7: What else did the critics say?
turn.8: Many of the reviews also praised Nanjiani's return as Prismo.
turn.9: What other aspects of the episode were notable?
turn.10: Reviews were also complimentary towards the darker nature of "Escape from the Citadel".
turn.12: Both episodes were watched by 3.321 million viewers.
